reviews.review: One of the best free FPS games you can get in terms of game play and uniqueness. However the community can be very very toxic at times
Dobrá hra jenom spusta ruských kidů co řvou blbosti do voice chatu a za celou hru mají 3 killy.

Szerintem a legtöbben ismerik ezt a játékot, szóval újat nem tudok róla mondani.
Viszont számomra az egyik legkedveltebb FPS játék.

别人玩有框，我玩为什么没框？

I love the gameplay.  Truly revolutionary, the modern and sophisticated vibe of the gunplay is unparalleled in the FPS world.  Community is stellar and the dev team is one of the most attentive and committed in the world in my opinion.  A world-class game, and it's free!

игра очень прикольное обновление топовые сам играю давно.Рекомендую эту игру

1. A large number of players with cheats enabled and complaints about them do not give any result. 2. When playing online, you cannot select a map, sometimes you have to spend 5-25! minutes to join the desired map, this is idiotic. 3. Also in this part of the COP, pistols, for example, mp5, are leveled, and sniper rifles, on the contrary, give too much advantage. 4. The game is poorly designed, like a desert eagle duel, and the Glock pistol hits the Glock?! 5. You can play interesting only on four maps: office, agency, Italy, Cablestone, on the other maps you can easily be killed with sniper rifles. Players with cheats are easy to identify, they are in the first places on every map of the game, which is impossible, and after sending them a complaint, they are sometimes afraid to immediately join your team, so there is no point. complain about them. When cheats allow you to see the silhouettes of players through walls, it helps to better aim and shoot at the head. there must be algorithms that will make it clear that the player is using cheats, for example, his personal score of 20:0 and even more complex algorithms. there are other inconsistencies in weapons and glitches when you do not see the enemy around the corner at the same surface level, but he sees your shoulder and arm.
Good Game i reccomend everyone to play it all day

не рекомендую данное подобие игры нормальным пацанам, у которых есть хоть какое-то подобие личной жизни. на момент обзора я наиграл 1467 часов и могу с уверенностью сказать, что оно того не стоит, парни, но если вы профессионально занимаетесь армреслингом правой рукой, то добро пожаловать в клуб дрочеров "тысяча часов". и в назидание грядущим поколениям - не перезаряжайтесь
